price: (Àwọn òpìdán) sọ pé: “Kò sí ìnira fún wa! Dájúdájú àwa yó sì fàbọ̀ sí ọ̀dọ̀ Olúwa wa.
arabic: قَالُواْ لَا ضَيۡرَۖ إِنَّآ إِلَىٰ رَبِّنَا مُنقَلِبُونَ

version.title: Yoruba translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Yoruba by Abu Rahima Mikhail Aikweiny, printed in 1432 H.

meta.transliteration: qālū lā ḍayra innā ilā rabbinā munqalibūna
